mapper.select: select W.*, I.attachment, A.* from work W left outer join work_image I on W.work_no = I.work left outer join artist A on W.artist_no = A.artist_no where I.attachment = ( select min(attachment) from work_image where work = W.work_no ) order by W.work_no desc

select count(*) from work W left outer join work_image I on W.work_no = I.work left outer join artist A on W.artist_no = A.artist_no where I.attachment = ( select min(attachment) from work_image where work = W.work_no ) order by W.work_no desc
select min(attachment) from work_image where work = #{workNo}
select attachment from work_image where work = #{workNo}
